summary: A brief email from an unidentified sender to an unidentified recipient, relaying a message that Jeffrey Epstein would like to speak with the recipient and providing instructions to call a telephone number to be connected to him.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email states that Jeffrey Epstein would like to speak with the recipient and provides a telephone number to call to be connected to him.

events.title: Epstein requests a call
events.description: An email is sent relaying a message that Jeffrey Epstein would like to speak with an unidentified recipient.

keyFacts: An email dated October 3, 2012, shows Jeffrey Epstein actively seeking communication with an unidentified individual.
The email provides a telephone number (redacted in the provided text) to call to be connected to Epstein.
The sender and recipient of the email are not identified in the provided text.
